itunes:title: #244 - Astrology, Luck, and Divine Timing in Business with Mecca Woods
title: #244 - Astrology, Luck, and Divine Timing in Business with Mecca Woods
description:
Mecca Woods joins Emily to explore the vast world of astrology and discern the most important pieces for using it to plan for business. Recorded live at the Gathering: Guided by Intuition online event.

Get full show notes for this episode here
